title: Extraordinary Chef Tom Aikens’s Ordinary Kitchen
text:
Extraordinary Chef Tom Aikens’s Ordinary Kitchen 9/16/2015 9:41AM Chef Tom Aikens is credited with helping reinvent British cooking and runs a string of restaurants around the globe. But at home in his London flat, he does the cooking in a regular family kitchen. Photo: Vanessa Berberian for The Wall Street Journal Transcript
